description: This file defines the EventController class in a Spring Boot application, handling REST API endpoints for event management, including create, read, update, delete, and listing operations.

classes.name: EventController
classes.description: A REST controller handling CRUD operations and listing for events, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and OpenAPI documentation.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new event from the provided EventDto and returns its response DTO with status 201 Created.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of events, possibly filtered by date range, organizer, and tags.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves an event by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing event with given ID using the provided EventDto.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the event with the specified ID.

methods.name: parseSort
methods.description: Parses the sort parameter into a Spring Sort object.
